Package se.swedenconnect.signservice.protocol

Interface ProtocolHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SignServiceHandler
    public interface ProtocolHandler
extends SignServiceHandler
    A handler interface for decoding and encoding Sign request and response messages.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      SignResponseMessage createSignResponseMessage​(SignServiceContext context, SignRequestMessage signRequestMessage)
      A factory method that creates a SignResponseMessage given the context and the corresponding request message.
      SignResponseResult createSuccessResult()
      Creates a SignResponseResult object indicating a successful response.
      SignRequestMessage decodeRequest​(HttpUserRequest httpRequest, SignServiceContext context)
      Given a message (the HTTP request received by the SignService frontend/application) and the context the handler decodes the message into a SignRequestMessage instance.
      HttpResponseAction encodeResponse​(SignResponseMessage responseMessage, SignServiceContext context)
      Encodes a response message so that it can be returned to the SignService application.
      SignResponseResult translateError​(SignServiceError error)
      Translates from the generic SignServiceError object to a protocol specific SignResponseResult object.

      • Methods inherited from interface se.swedenconnect.signservice.core.SignServiceHandler

        getName

    • Method Detail

      • decodeRequest

        @Nonnull
SignRequestMessage decodeRequest​(@Nonnull
                                 HttpUserRequest httpRequest,
                                 @Nonnull
                                 SignServiceContext context)
                          throws ProtocolException
        Given a message (the HTTP request received by the SignService frontend/application) and the context the handler decodes the message into a SignRequestMessage instance.

        No validation of the message is performed, other than ensuring that a decode operation is possible.

        Parameters:
        httpRequest - the HTTP request received by the SignService frontend/application
        context - the SignService context
        Returns:
        a SignRequestMessage
        Throws:
        ProtocolException - for decoding errors

      • createSignResponseMessage

        @Nonnull
SignResponseMessage createSignResponseMessage​(@Nonnull
                                              SignServiceContext context,
                                              @Nonnull
                                              SignRequestMessage signRequestMessage)
                                       throws ProtocolException
        A factory method that creates a SignResponseMessage given the context and the corresponding request message.

        Which parts of the SignResponseMessage that is populated is implementation dependent, but the ProtocolProcessingRequirements of the created object will always be present, i.e., SignRequestMessage.getProcessingRequirements() will be non-null.

        Parameters:
        context - the SignService context
        signRequestMessage - the corresponding request message
        Returns:
        a SignResponseMessage
        Throws:
        ProtocolException - if a response message cannot be created

      • encodeResponse

        @Nonnull
HttpResponseAction encodeResponse​(@Nonnull
                                  SignResponseMessage responseMessage,
                                  @Nonnull
                                  SignServiceContext context)
                           throws ProtocolException
        Encodes a response message so that it can be returned to the SignService application. The method will create a HttpResponseActionÂ representing the response message as a HTTP request (redirect or post).
        Parameters:
        responseMessage - the response message to encode
        context - the SignService context
        Returns:
        a HttpRequestMessage
        Throws:
        ProtocolException - for encoding errors

      • createSuccessResult

        @Nonnull
SignResponseResult createSuccessResult()
        Creates a SignResponseResult object indicating a successful response.
        Returns:
        a SignResponseResult object

      • translateError

        @Nonnull
SignResponseResult translateError​(@Nonnull
                                  SignServiceError error)
        Translates from the generic SignServiceError object to a protocol specific SignResponseResult object.
        Parameters:
        error - the error to translate
        Returns:
        a SignResponseResult
